dim.name: ONE
dim.description: The number one as a dimension.

dim.name: nCategories
dim.description: The number of ice thickness categories.

dim.name: nIceLayers
dim.description: The number of ice layers in the vertical direction.

dim.name: nSnowLayers
dim.description: The number of snow layers in the vertical direction.

dim.name: nIceLayersP1
dim.description: The number of ice layers in the vertical direction plus one.

dim.name: nCategoriesP1
dim.description: The number of ice thickness categories plus one.

dim.name: nAerosols
dim.description: Number of aerosol species carried in the ice (NCAR scheme)

dim.name: nSpectralIntervals
dim.description: Number of spectral intervals in the radiation calculation

dim.name: nGrainAgingTemperature
dim.description: Number of temperature dependent factors in snow grain aging

dim.name: nGrainAgingTempGradient
dim.description: Number of temperature gradient dependent factors in snow grain aging

dim.name: nGrainAgingSnowDensity
dim.description: Number of snow density dependent factors in snow grain aging

dim.name: nBioLayers
dim.description: Number of levels in the biological grid

dim.name: nBioLayersP1
dim.description: Number of levels in the interface biological grid

dim.name: nBioLayersP2
dim.description: Number of levels in the biological grid plus two

dim.name: nBioLayersP3
dim.description: Number of biological levels in the ice and snow

dim.name: maxAlgaeType
dim.description: Maximum number of ice algal types

dim.name: maxDOCType
dim.description: Maximum number of dissolved organic carbon groups

dim.name: maxDICType
dim.description: Maximum number of dissolved inorganic carbon groups

dim.name: maxDONType
dim.description: Maximum number of dissolved organic nitrogen groups

dim.name: maxIronType
dim.description: Maximum number of dissolved or particulate iron groups

dim.name: maxBCType
dim.description: Maximum number of black carbon species carried in the ice

dim.name: maxDustType
dim.description: Maximum number of dust species carried in the ice

dim.name: maxAerosolType
dim.description: Total maximum number of aerosols carried in the ice

dim.name: nModal1
dim.description: Specifies the second dimension of the modal aerosol optical parameter matrix

dim.name: nModal2
dim.description: Specifies the third dimension of the modal aerosol optical parameter matrix

dim.name: nAlgae
dim.description: Number of algal species in use

dim.name: nDOC
dim.description: Number of dissolved organic carbon groups in use

dim.name: nDIC
dim.description: Number of dissolved inorganic carbon groups in use

dim.name: nDON
dim.description: Number of dissolved organic nitrogen groups in use

dim.name: nParticulateIron
dim.description: Number of particulate iron species in use

dim.name: nDissolvedIron
dim.description: Number of dissolved iron species in use

dim.name: nzAerosols
dim.description: Number of aerosol species carried in the ice

dim.name: nShortwaveBio
dim.description: Number of levels in the radiation calculation with biological species

dim.name: nAlgaeLayers
dim.description: Total number of algal layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nAlgaeIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of algal layers in the ice

dim.name: nAlgaeSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of algal layers in the snow

dim.name: nDOCLayers
dim.description: Total number of DOC layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nDOCIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of DOC layers in the ice

dim.name: nDOCSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of DOC layers in the snow

dim.name: nDICLayers
dim.description: Total number of DIC layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nDICIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of DIC layers in the ice

dim.name: nDICSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of DIC layers in the snow

dim.name: nDONLayers
dim.description: Total number of DON layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nDONIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of DON layers in the ice

dim.name: nDONSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of DON layers in the snow

dim.name: nParticulateIronLayers
dim.description: Total number of particulate iron layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nPartIronIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of particulate iron layers in the ice

dim.name: nPartIronSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of particulate iron layers in the snow

dim.name: nDissolvedIronLayers
dim.description: Total number of dissolved iron layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nDisIronIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of dissolved iron layers in the ice

dim.name: nDisIronSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of dissolved iron layers in the snow

dim.name: nzAerosolsLayers
dim.description: Total number of z-aerosol layers including two for snow plus the interface grid

dim.name: nzAerosolsSnowLayers
dim.description: Total number of z-aerosol layers in the snow

dim.name: nzAerosolsIceLayers
dim.description: Total number of z-aerosol layers in the ice

dim.name: nZBGCTracers
dim.description: Maximum number of distinct biological or chemical tracer types

dim.name: nSpectralIntervalsSNICAR
dim.description: The number of shortwave spectral bands used in snow SNICAR model (1 visible band and 4 near-IR bands) for radiative transfer calculation

dim.name: nSnowGrainRadiusSNICAR
dim.description: The number of snow grain radius used in SNICAR model, radius are ranging from 30 to 150 microns with 1 micron interval

dim.name: nHemispheres
dim.description: The number of hemispheres (global, north, south).
